column5: Establish a career with any of the world's most affluential institutions, government regulators, or in academia. MSc Finance and Econometrics at Southampton is one of the only masters in the UK to offer specialist training in advanced econometrics techniques and their application to Finance. We’re also ranked Top 15 in the UK for Economics and Econometrics (QS World University Rankings by Subject 2023).The full-time programme lasts 12 months, with nine months of taught modules between October and June of the academic year, followed by three summer months of supervised research for a Masters’ dissertation.
column7: A variety of scholarships, grants and bursaries may be available to help you fund your study, both from the University and from other organisations  Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 Year Full Time / 2 Years Part Time
